title: In New Zealand only
fullText:
One of the following means of isolation shall be provided for the gas appliance:
(a)	A plug to an accessible switched socket-outlet.
or
(b)	A plug to a socket-outlet that may be located in an inaccessible position but has a separate switch operating in all active conductors that is located in an accessible position.
or
(c)	An isolating switch (lockable) operating in all active conductors.
